arguments.argument: /* Draws the Goal UI, with the counts */ draw_sprite(sprite_index,-1,x,y) draw_set_halign(fa_middle) draw_set_valign(fa_center) draw_set_color(c_black) draw_set_font(fMedium) draw_text(x,y,string(oDoor.out)+"/"+string(oDoor.need)) draw_set_halign(fa_left) draw_set_valign(fa_top)
